title: Machine Learning Basics
description: Learn how ML works and how to build simple models from scratch.

title: Frontend Development with React
description: Master React to build interactive user interfaces and single-page apps.

title: Advanced Python
description: Explore advanced Python features, best practices, and performance tips.

title: Deep Learning Foundations
description: Dive into neural networks, TensorFlow, and PyTorch to build deep learning models.

title: Java Basics
description: Get started with Java syntax, OOP principles, and basic data structures.

title: Advanced Java
description: Learn generics, concurrency, streams, and design patterns in Java.

title: Data Structures & Algorithms in Java
description: Implement and analyze key data structures and algorithms using Java.

title: Data Structures & Algorithms in Python
description: Practice essential DSA concepts using Python for interviews and projects.

title: DSA with C/C++
description: Master data structures and algorithms in C and C++ for performance-critical apps.

title: JavaScript Basics
description: Understand JS syntax, DOM manipulation, and event handling in the browser.

title: JavaScript Advanced Patterns
description: Learn closures, prototypes, async/await, and modern ES6+ features.

title: Web Development Basics
description: HTML, CSS & JS fundamentals to build static and responsive web pages.

title: Full-Stack JavaScript Backend
description: Build RESTful APIs using Node.js, Express, and MongoDB.

title: Spring Boot Microservices
description: Create scalable microservices with Spring Boot, JPA, and Docker.

title: HTML, CSS & Advanced Layouts
description: Master CSS Grid, Flexbox, and responsive design techniques.

title: REST API Design
description: Best practices for designing, documenting, and testing RESTful services.

title: DevOps Essentials
description: CI/CD pipelines, Docker, Kubernetes, and infrastructure as code.

title: Data Science with R
description: Statistical analysis, visualization, and machine learning using R.

title: Natural Language Processing
description: Text preprocessing, embeddings, and building NLP pipelines.

title: Cloud Computing Fundamentals
description: Learn AWS/GCP basics, virtual networks, and cloud storage services.
